sentence: Now Perdue is running in the Republican primary for Georgia governor against incumbent Republican Brian Kemp, and he is hoping this time support from Trump will be enough to galvanize supporters.
title: AJC politics reporter Greg Bluestein on his new book and whether Georgia may be 'Flipped' again

author: Patricia Murphy
title: Politically Georgia: The final dash at the Legislature is underway

title: A tidal wave of cash hits Georgias Senate race

sentence: And if theyre not voting for Brian Kemp, theyre not going to be able to vote for Herschel Walker.? Per Bluestein, Kemp is fighting back, saying in a new statement, "Governor Kemp is laser-focused on uniting Republicans on May 24th to make sure Stacey Abrams is never our governor or the next president."
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Trump tells Perdue tele-rally that Republicans will bomb in Georgia if Brian Kemp is re-nominated
